com.fluidops.fedx
Class FedXFactory

java.lang.Object
  com.fluidops.fedx.FedXFactory

public class FedXFactory
extends java.lang.Object

FedX initialization factory methods for convenience: methods initialize the FederationManager and all required FedX structures. See FederationManager for some a code snippet.

Author:
Andreas Schwarte

initializeFederation

public static org.openrdf.repository.sail.SailRepository initializeFederation(java.lang.String dataConfig)
                                                                       throws java.lang.Exception
Initialize the federation with a specified data source configuration file (*.ttl). Federation members are constructed from the data source configuration. Sample data source configuration files can be found in the documentation. NOTE: Config#initialize() needs to be invoked before.

Parameters:
dataConfig - the location of the data source configuration
Returns:
the initialized FedX federation Sail wrapped in a SailRepository
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

initializeFederation

public static org.openrdf.repository.sail.SailRepository initializeFederation(java.lang.String fedxConfig,
                                                                              java.util.List<Endpoint> additionalEndpoints)
                                                                       throws FedXException
Initialize the federation by providing information about the fedx configuration (c.f. Config for details on configuration parameters) and additional endpoints to add. The fedx configuration can provide information about the dataConfig to be used which may contain the default federation members. The Federation employs a MemoryCache which is located at Config.getCacheLocation().

Parameters:
fedxConfig - the location of the fedx configuration
additionalEndpoints - additional endpoints to be added, may be null or empty
Returns:
the initialized FedX federation Sail wrapped in a SailRepository
Throws:
java.lang.Exception
FedXException

initializeFederation

public static org.openrdf.repository.sail.SailRepository initializeFederation(java.util.List<Endpoint> endpoints)
                                                                       throws FedXException
Initialize the federation by providing the endpoints to add. The fedx configuration can provide information about the dataConfig to be used which may contain the default federation members.

NOTE: Config#initialize() needs to be invoked before.

Parameters:
additionalEndpoints - additional endpoints to be added, may be null or empty
Returns:
the initialized FedX federation Sail wrapped in a SailRepository
Throws:
java.lang.Exception
FedXException
